name: The Nottingham Belfry - A QHotel

reviews.text: We have stayed at this hotel a number of times and our stay has always been comfortable. The rooms are very modern and the staff are very friendly.The food is also very good and we have never had to complain about anything. I would reccommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Nottingham area.
reviews.title: christmas at the belfry

reviews.text: We feel this hotel deserves the highest praise. We were welcomed warmly at reception and arrangements to access our room dealt with both pleasantly and efficiently. We occupied one of the suites and the accommodation was of a very high standard; in fact leaving nothing to be desired. Breakfast was an equally pleasant experinece with staff who were pleasant and attentive and good food.
reviews.title: Our Stay over Christmas at the Nottingham Belfrey

reviews.text: We will certianly recommend your Hotel to our friends.
reviews.title: The best hotel I have found in that immediate area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am not a fan of huge brand hotels and have only stayed in this hotel, in the Q Hotel chain. But I like here, the people who work there are friendly, the rooms are comfortable and the food in the restaurant is nicely cooked (although I would like to see the menu change more frequently). The bar area is comfortable and the leisure facilities are good, if you have time. The one slight downside is the road near the hotel which you can hear from some rooms, but wouldn't stop me staying there
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: We had a two night stay here including breakfast. We arrived the first evening looking forward to a meal in the restaurant only to be told when we arrived that it was closed due to lack of food and more than likely anything we tried to order on the menu they would not be able to deliver.
reviews.title: New Year's Eve Gala Dinner

reviews.text: Stayed at the end of Jan'12 with a friend on a two night break. We were pleased with our twin room as it was a good size and included a seating area as well as good quality bathroom with shower and bath.
reviews.title: Good quality hotel, very good evening dinner service, would highly recommend the spa.

reviews.text: The decor and overall presentation of the hotel was of a good quality.
reviews.title: spa break for 3 Ladies

reviews.text: We were very happy with both the quality of service and the standard of food in the dining room. Staff were friendly, efficient and attentive. Food was some of the best either of us had eaten in a chain hotel of this star rating. The wine list was also good, as were the choices of cocktails.
reviews.title: Modern Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The spa was a little haven in which we spent nearly the whole of one day. Treatments were reasonably priced and staff were lovely and obviously accomplished in their chosen field. Both of us commented that we felt at least ten times better than the £100 we spent in there!
reviews.title: Had a great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The gym and pool are small, but adequate for the size of hotel and again, staff were helpful.
reviews.title: Professional

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were looking for a reasonably priced, spa type hotel for a one night break between Christmas & New Year. We had stayed at a Q Hotel before in Warrington & after that experience was happy to try another.
reviews.title: Lovely one night break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got a good deal for Dinner Bed & Breakfast in a Q Star room, it was possily one of the nicest rooms we have stayed in a UK hotel, very spacious, modern with a touch of luxury. Nice big bathroom with seperate bath & shower cubicle. The hotel in general was very nice, we used the pool in the daytime. The meal 3 course evening meal was superb & the restaraunt is lovely.
reviews.title: 2 Night Spa Break - Flawless!!!

reviews.text: The hotel is not in the most glamerous location (in the middle of a business park) however you soon forget where you are when you are inside the hotel.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: Most of the staff we encountered were helpful & professional.
reviews.title: High standards of comfort, service and dining.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One little gripe: When we checked into our room there were 2 dirty plates, dishes & half bottle of stale beer right outside our room door. 2 housekeeping staff walking down the corridor saw us check into the room & watched while we moved the dishes out the way ! The pots were still outside our door an hour later, we asked 2 different staff members who were stood chatting in the corridor if they could be moved. No big deal but you dont expect things like that to be too much trouble for staff in a 4* hotel.
reviews.title: All round relaxation

reviews.text: I was really surprised of how good this hotel was. Big, Clean, Tidy, Excellent Rooms and the staff were truly awesome. The receptionists were really friendly and the bar and certainly the staff serving in the restaurant were brilliant. The food was excellent and my overall stay was 10 out of 10!
reviews.title: An Excellent Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Heard mainly good and some bad reports on this hotel, so was unsure how our stay would be. Our experience staying at this hotel was fantastic, the hotel is modern, smart, clean and comfortable and the staff we came into contact with were both helpful and polite. Our suite was lovely with everything promised on the website. Didn't have an evening meal but breakfast was lovely and again staff were great. Can't wait to stay there again and may try one of the other QHotels. Thanks to all at The Nottingham Belfry for making an important stay great!!
reviews.title: Very smart and clean hotel and friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in several of the Q hotels, and this is by far the best. We had 2 nights here between Christmas and NewYear. The rooms are very clean and comfortable, the staff helpful and friendly and the food excellent. I woud definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Nottingham area - and if you want to go into the city drive just down the road and use the park and ride and travel into the city by tram - brilliant!!!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The staff deserve the highest of praises for their professional, friendly and extremely helpful attitude especially Leanne who served behind the bar and in the restaurant and Chris who worked behind the reception desk.
reviews.title: Exceptional

reviews.text: The hotel is modern, stylish, very clean and comfortable. The quality of food served in the restaurant is second to none.
reviews.title: Great nights stay

aka: The Nottingham Belfry - a q Hotel Nottingham
description: The Nottingham Belfry is ideally located just one mile from the M1 and 5 miles from Nottingham city centre. The contemporary four-star hotel has 120 spacious bedrooms, a superb leisure club and tranquil spa. The Nottingham Belfry is the region's largest conference venue as the hotel can hold up to 700 delegates in the Admiralty Suite or across 13 flexible conference and meeting rooms.
